name: Chain Explosion (itch)
description:
||CONTROLS||

WASD Movement

LMB - FIRE

RMB - Knockback Grenade

Weekly Game Jam 170 Submission!

Theme: Chain-Reaction

This is my 3rd game jam entry. It is a top down shooter and the idea is that when you destroy an enemy, it causes explosions that react with other enemies and environments. Leave your feedback!

Music: https://opengameart.org/content/as-far-as-the-eye
